mapper.sql: TRANS_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, TRANS_ORDER_ID, TRANS_ORDER, CAR_VIN, CAR_MODEL, DEALER_NO, DEALER_NAME, TO_DATE, PLANNED_DISPATCHED_DATE, ACTUAL_PICKUP_DATE, ACTUAL_DISPATCHED_DATE, EST_TOHUB_DATE, DUE_DATE, ZONE, REMARK, STARTING_STATION, TERMINAL_STATION, CABIN_NUMBER, LATEST_PROVINCE, LATEST_CITY, LATEST_STATION, LATEST_STATUS, IS_ARRIVED, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, BILL_STATUS, CORP_ID, FLAG, LATEST_UPDATE_TIME

where detail.del = 0 and detail.TRANS_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{transOrderDetailId} and detail.TRANS_ORDER_ID = #{transOrderId} and detail.TRANS_ORDER = #{transOrder} and detail.CAR_VIN = #{carVin} and detail.CAR_MODEL = #{carModel} and detail.DEALER_NO = #{dealerNo} and detail.DEALER_NAME = #{dealerName} and detail.TO_DATE = #{toDate} and detail.PLANNED_DISPATCHED_DATE = #{plannedDispatchedDate} and detail.ACTUAL_PICKUP_DATE = #{actualPickupDate} and detail.ACTUAL_DISPATCHED_DATE = #{actualDispatchedDate} and detail.EST_TOHUB_DATE = #{estTohubDate} and detail.DUE_DATE = #{dueDate} and detail.ZONE = #{zone} and detail.REMARK = #{remark} and detail.STARTING_STATION = #{startingStation} and detail.TERMINAL_STATION = #{terminalStation} and detail.CABIN_NUMBER = #{cabinNumber} and detail.LATEST_PROVINCE = #{latestProvince} and detail.LATEST_CITY = #{latestCity} and detail.LATEST_STATION = #{latestStation} and detail.LATEST_STATUS = #{latestStatus} and detail.IS_ARRIVED = #{isArrived} and detail.CREATOR = #{creator} and detail.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and detail.CHECKER = #{checker} and detail.CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} and detail.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and detail.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and detail.FLAG = #{flag}
mapper.select: select from rt_railtrans_order_detail where TRANS_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{transOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and DEL = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into rt_railtrans_order_detail (TRANS_ORDER_ID, TRANS_ORDER, CAR_VIN, CAR_MODEL, DEALER_NO, DEALER_NAME, TO_DATE, PLANNED_DISPATCHED_DATE, ACTUAL_PICKUP_DATE, ACTUAL_DISPATCHED_DATE, EST_TOHUB_DATE, DUE_DATE, ZONE, REMARK, STARTING_STATION, TERMINAL_STATION, CABIN_NUMBER, LATEST_PROVINCE, LATEST_CITY, LATEST_STATION, LATEST_STATUS, IS_ARRIVED, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, BILL_STATUS, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{transOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{plannedDispatchedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualPickupDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualDispatchedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{estTohubDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startingStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cabinNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isArrived,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into rt_railtrans_order_detail TRANS_ORDER_ID, TRANS_ORDER, CAR_VIN, CAR_MODEL, DEALER_NO, DEALER_NAME, TO_DATE, PLANNED_DISPATCHED_DATE, ACTUAL_PICKUP_DATE, ACTUAL_DISPATCHED_DATE, EST_TOHUB_DATE, DUE_DATE, ZONE, REMARK, STARTING_STATION, TERMINAL_STATION, CABIN_NUMBER, LATEST_PROVINCE, LATEST_CITY, LATEST_STATION, LATEST_STATUS, IS_ARRIVED, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, BILL_STATUS, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{transOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{plannedDispatchedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualPickupDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualDispatchedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{estTohubDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startingStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cabinNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isArrived,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update rt_railtrans_order_detail TRANS_ORDER_ID = #{transOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRANS_ORDER = #{transOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_MODEL = #{carModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_NO = #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_NAME = #{dealerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE = #{toDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PLANNED_DISPATCHED_DATE = #{plannedDispatchedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTUAL_PICKUP_DATE = #{actualPickupDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTUAL_DISPATCHED_DATE = #{actualDispatchedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EST_TOHUB_DATE = #{estTohubDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DUE_DATE = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZONE = #{zone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARTING_STATION = #{startingStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMINAL_STATION = #{terminalStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CABIN_NUMBER = #{cabinNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_PROVINCE = #{latestProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_CITY = #{latestCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_STATION = #{latestStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_STATUS = #{latestStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_UPDATE_TIME = #{latestUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_ARRIVED = #{isArrived,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where TRANS_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{transOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rt_railtrans_order_detail set TRANS_ORDER_ID = #{transOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRANS_ORDER = #{transOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_MODEL = #{carModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_NO = #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_NAME = #{dealerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE = #{toDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PLANNED_DISPATCHED_DATE = #{plannedDispatchedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTUAL_PICKUP_DATE = #{actualPickupDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTUAL_DISPATCHED_DATE = #{actualDispatchedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EST_TOHUB_DATE = #{estTohubDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DUE_DATE = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZONE = #{zone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARTING_STATION = #{startingStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMINAL_STATION = #{terminalStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CABIN_NUMBER = #{cabinNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_PROVINCE = #{latestProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_CITY = #{latestCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_STATION = #{latestStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_STATUS = #{latestStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_UPDATE_TIME = #{latestUpdateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_ARRIVED = #{isArrived,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where TRANS_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{transOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from rt_railtrans_order_detail detail order by detail.CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: update rt_railtrans_order_detail set DEL = '1' where TRANS_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{transOrderDetailId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
update rt_railtrans_order_detail set TERMINAL_STATION = #{terminalStation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CABIN_NUMBER = #{cabinNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CAR_VIN = #{carVin, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update rt_railtrans_order_detail set LATEST_PROVINCE = #{latestProvince, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_CITY = #{latestCity, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_STATION = #{latestStation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_STATUS = #{latestStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ARRIVED = #{isArrived, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONE = #{zone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_UPDATE_TIME = #{latestUpdateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CABIN_NUMBER = #{cabinNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select distinct CABIN_NUMBER, TERMINAL_STATION from rt_railtrans_order_detail where (IS_ARRIVED = '0' or IS_ARRIVED is NULL) and CABIN_NUMBER is not null and (LATEST_UPDATE_TIME is null or LATEST_UPDATE_TIME <= #{latestUpdateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
select from rt_railtrans_order_detail where DEL = '0' and CAR_VIN in #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by CAR_VIN;
select from rt_railtrans_order_detail where DEL = '0' and CABIN_NUMBER in #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by CABIN_NUMBER;
mapper.sql: where del = 0 and TRANS_ORDER_ID = #{transOrderId} and CABIN_NUMBER = #{cabinNumber} and CAR_VIN in #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select from rt_railtrans_order_detail order by IS_ARRIVED desc,CABIN_NUMBER DESC,DEALER_NO
